Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time multiplayer gameplay, procedurally generated worlds, and cross-platform support. Players can mine resources, upgrade equipment, trade with others, and explore vast underground caverns while managing fuel, health, and inventory. The game includes cloud save functionality, admin controls for hosts, and supports both desktop and mobile play with virtual controls.
